title: Nurse Resident Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: get taken into an auditorium and sit with other applicants who are interviewing for the same unit as you; get brought to front of auditorium and spend about 10 minutes getting interviewed
Interview Questions: asked several questions such as how I approach working with a difficult coworker, how I give feedback to supervisors or clinical instructors, etc

title: Registered Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital
Interview Descriptions: The interview was casual and I felt very comfortable with the staff that interviewed me. It was thorough and I was given opportunities to explain and describe my previous work history. Very pleasant.

title: WIC Clerk Interview
Application Type: The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital (Atlanta, GA)
Interview Descriptions: The interview was easy asked question mostly regarding customer service skills, multi-tasking, compliance with hospital, state and federal regulations (can you follow them), will you have problems with the commute, and how do you handle stress.
Interview Questions: Have you ever had an incident were you had a conflict with my management regarding a new procedure that you that you thought was not efficient but had no choice but to follow?

title: Technical Lab Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: Moderate. Basic interview questions and pretty straight forward. Interviewed around 10am and received a call back for the position later within the afternoon. In addition, the interview went by relatively quick. Interviewed with two managers and both asked their set of collective questions. Questions were based on being a team player.
Interview Questions: How have you displayed leadership role

title: Ultrasonographer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital (Atlanta, GA)
Interview Descriptions: I was asked to scan and abdomen and pelvic ultrasound exam. I was then taken in the supervisors office and asked multiple questions about my history  and experience in ultrasound.
Interview Questions: Why do I want to work for Grady Health System?

title: Social Worker Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital (Atlanta, GA) in Jun 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was a long interview process but very worth it! It began as a phone screening to see if I was a good match for the hospital. They then called me in and asked me quite a few situational questions.

title: Phelbotomist Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital (Atlanta, GA) in Jun 2014
Interview Descriptions: The whole interview process was like 1 hour. The people that asked the questions tried to be intimidating , tellng me about how the news station is always at the hospital, and that how I need to be careful and that I cant be scared
Interview Questions: Have you ever had a confrontation with anyone at your job

title: CNA Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital
Interview Descriptions: Quick and fast. I interviewed with the unit director, two CNAs and a charge nurse. The questions where straight forward. The interview was fast and I had a great time.

title: RN Staff Nurse Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital (Atlanta, GA)
Interview Descriptions: Hiring in pass was faster and easier they called you in and you sometimes started that day to work in the Busy ER mostly or any one of the ICU that were soo short staffed.
Interview Questions: Nothing was too difficult I found at Grady it was a great learning experience for me and all RN's

title: Case Management Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital (Atlanta, GA) in Sept 2013
Interview Descriptions: This was an internship through my MSW program, so no real interview process. Just a brief meeting with the director of the Social Services Department, then I was accepted for the internship program.

title: Volunteer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital (Atlanta, GA) in Jul 2013
Interview Descriptions: submit immunization records, online application, 2 state ID, go through a lecture and a test
Interview Questions: very lengthy application process, staff not very friendly

title: Medical Lab Scientist Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 4 weeks. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital (Atlanta, GA) in Apr 2012
Interview Descriptions: I interned at Grady so it was easy for me to get in. I started working as soon the internship was over. I was interviewed by three managers. I enjoyed working there, but I did not see it as a place where I could grow and expand myself.
Interview Questions:
Why Grady?
Where do you see yourself in a few years?
What is your motivation?

title: Senior Licensed Mental Health Clinician II Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at Grady Memorial Hospital in May 2010
Interview Descriptions: It was pretty basic.  They really just wanted to know if you were breathing and if you had a clinical licensed that was needed for the job.
